main event: A spherical object was observed changing colors from bright white to blue to red, reportedly hovering in the sky on 8 September 1960.
interesting points: The object was the size of a volleyball and displayed intermittent flashing lights., The object did not move across the sky during the observation., The witnessing of the object prompted a report to the Air Force Office of Special Investigations., The sighting was recorded during a hazy, partly cloudy night., The investigating officer concluded it was likely an astronomical object.
